decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently cast a series of spells that will allow the player to immediately win the game. By utilizing a combination of creatures with powerful abilities, mana acceleration, and cards that allow for tutoring and protection, the goal is to assemble the necessary pieces to achieve victory in a single turn. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and high-risk, relying on precise play and careful planning to execute the combo successfully.

The main concept of this deck is to play aggressively with low-cost creatures and spells, utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Sprite Dragon, and Young Pyromancer to put pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes counter spells like Force of Will and Force of Negation to protect its threats while disrupting the opponent's game plan. With a focus on tempo and efficiency, the UR Aggro deck aims to control the board and quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The main focus of this Elf combo deck is to generate a large amount of mana using cards like Gaea's Cradle, Heritage Druid, and Nettle Sentinel, to play powerful creatures like Craterhoof Behemoth and Archon of Valor's Reach to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes disruption elements like Collector Ouphe to slow down opposing strategies. The deck aims to utilize cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Natural Order to tutor for key combo pieces and win the game quickly. Overall, the deck aims to generate a large amount of mana and power out strong creatures to overrun the opponent.

The main focus of this Legacy Combo-Elves deck is to quickly generate mana, draw cards, and tutor for key pieces to assemble a game-winning combo. By utilizing cards like Heritage Druid, Nettle Sentinel, and Glimpse of Nature, the deck aims to flood the board with Elves to power up a Craterhoof Behemoth finisher or to set up a game-ending Natural Order. The deck also includes hate cards like Collector Ouphe and Archon of Valor's Reach to disrupt opponent strategies and protect its own game plan. The mana base is optimized for maximizing the potential of Gaea's Cradle.

This Bant Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal spells, while also utilizing card advantage engines like Sylvan Library and Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Terminus and Council's Judgment, while generating value with Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The win conditions include Shark Typhoon, Entreat the Angels, and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck also includes versatile cards like Ice-Fang Coatl and Snapcaster Mage to adapt to different situations.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly feed cards like Stitcher's Supplier and Careful Study to the graveyard, allowing for the quick access to cards like Hogaak, Vengevine, and Bloodghast. The deck utilizes the combo potential of Bridge from Below to generate Zombie tokens and create a powerful board presence. Additionally, the deck includes sacrifice outlets like Carrion Feeder and Altar of Dementia to fuel the graveyard and trigger various effects. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and resilient combination of creatures and recurring threats.

The main idea of this Combo-Infect Legacy deck is to leverage the infect ability of creatures like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf to get the opponent's life total to 10 poison counters and win the game quickly. The deck includes control elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces, as well as pump spells like Berserk and Invigorate to increase the infect damage output. The deck also includes mana ramp with Noble Hierarch and cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to help find the necessary combo pieces.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling the combo pieces of Show and Tell and Omniscience to cheat in powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Griselbrand onto the battlefield for free. It includes card selection and manipulation spells like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Preordain to find combo pieces quickly. The deck also includes counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect the combo. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up a combo win condition in a fast and efficient manner.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the Dark Depths combo using cards like Crop Rotation, Sylvan Scrying, and Thespian's Stage. By combining Dark Depths with Thespian's Stage, you can create a 20/20 Marit Lage token in just one turn. The deck also includes cards like Vampire Hexmage to remove any counters on Dark Depths, as well as disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to protect the combo. The inclusion of acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and City of Brass helps to speed up the process of setting up the combo.

The deck focuses on utilizing Death's Shadow as a powerful threat, supported by cards like Street Wraith and Gurmag Angler to quickly apply pressure. Force of Will and Daze provide protection while Stifle disrupts the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes interaction and disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Brainstorm to control the game. The mana base is designed to support the deck's strategy, with a focus on fetching key lands like Underground Sea and Wasteland to maximize efficiency.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupt their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck aims to accelerate its mana base with lands like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors, while also being able to control the board with cards like Endbringer and Walking Ballista. By utilizing fast mana sources like Simian Spirit Guide and Elvish Spirit Guide, this deck can deploy threats quickly and apply pressure on the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Food Chain combo to generate infinite mana and cast powerful creatures such as Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Walking Ballista to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Misthollow Griffin and Eternal Scourge which can be cast from exile, providing continuous threats. With a mix of card draw, disruption, and ramp, the deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and quickly close out the game.

The main focus of this Legacy Infect deck is to quickly and efficiently use creatures like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf to deal poison counters to the opponent. This deck uses a mix of pump spells like Invigorate and Berserk, protection spells like Vines of Vastwood and Spell Pierce, and card draw/filtering spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to create a fast and deadly combo. The inclusion of Teferi, Time Raveler helps to protect the combo from disruption, while the mana base of dual lands and fetch lands ensures consistent mana availability.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping into powerful creatures like Griselbrand, Emrakul, and Uro by utilizing cards like Show and Tell and Omniscience to cheat them into play for free. The deck also includes a suite of cantrips, counterspells, and protection spells to help find combo pieces, disrupt the opponent, and protect key threats. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures early in the game and use their powerful abilities to seal the victory.

The deck focuses on quickly and efficiently cheating out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Griselbrand onto the battlefield using cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. It is able to do this by utilizing acceleration through cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide, as well as maintaining control with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation to find the combo pieces quickly. The mana base supports the strategy by providing the necessary colors and mana acceleration.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly deploy small and evasive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Sprite Dragon to deal damage to the opponent while disrupting their game plan with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The deck aims to maintain tempo advantage by keeping the opponent on the back foot with cards like Lightning Bolt and Flusterstorm. The inclusion of Nivmagus Elemental allows for potential explosive plays by exiling instants and sorceries to pump up the creature's power. The deck also features efficient card selection and card draw to ensure consistent threats and answers.
